column2: Levis Men Comfort Style Navy Blue Innerwear Vest
column21:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • Soft and absorbent 100% combed cotton vest. This is a navy vest with bold white trim
column22:
it has a square shaped neck and armhole binding which forms the straps over the shoulder. The Levi's logo features prominently on the back neck plus the signature red tag is stitched to the bottom hem

Wash care
Machine wash
Do not bleach
Tumble dry low
Warm iron as needed
Do not dry clean

Sporty shape and prominent Levi's logo combine to create a ultra masculine vest to be worn under any outfit.
